57462.en:
<voice 00375_00057462><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>Thank you for restoring a little of my spirit... Since
hearing rumors of the children's ghosts appearing, I
can't help but be anxious...<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57462.ja:
<voice 00375_00057462><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　ちょっと気力が戻ったよ。
　子供たちの幽霊が現れるって話を　聞いてから
　不安で　しょうがなくってさ……。<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57462.ko:
<voice 00375_00057462><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>: 고마워요. 이제야 좀 기운이 나네요.
　아이들의 유령이 나타난다는 말을 듣고
　어찌나 불안하던지…….<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57462.zh-Hans:
<voice 00375_00057462><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>谢谢，我感觉好一点了。
自从听说孩子们的幽灵出现，
我就担心得不得了……<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57462.zh-Hant:
<voice 00375_00057462><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>謝謝你，我好多了。
聽說孩子們的幽靈出現之後，
我就一直感到很不安……<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57463.en:
<voice 00440_00057463><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>You can always speak with me, so, please do not worry
about it. Little by little, we'll come to terms with it.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57463.ja:
<voice 00440_00057463><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「いつでも　お話に付き合いますから
　そう　思いつめないでください。
　少しずつ　現実を見据えていきましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57463.ko:
<voice 00440_00057463><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 언제든지 이야기를 들어 드릴 테니
　너무 혼자 고민하지 마십시오.
　조금씩 현실을 직시해 나가도록 합시다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57463.zh-Hans:
<voice 00440_00057463><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>你可以随时过来找我说，
千万不要太钻牛角尖。
慢慢地面对现实吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57463.zh-Hant:
<voice 00440_00057463><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我隨時都能陪妳聊，
妳就別太放在心上了。
一步一步慢慢面對現實吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57464.en:
<voice 00493_00057464><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>As always, I'm so sorry, Mayor... Losing your daughter,
it must be heart-breaking for your family too...<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57464.ja:
<voice 00493_00057464><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>「ホント　いつもすまないねえ……。
　町長さんとこも　娘さんを亡くしてて
　つらいでしょうに……。<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57464.ko:
<voice 00493_00057464><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>: 정말 늘 죄송해요…….
　촌장님네도 딸을 잃어서
　힘드실 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57464.zh-Hans:
<voice 00493_00057464><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>真不好意思，总是麻烦你……
镇长你没了女儿
一定也很伤心……<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57464.zh-Hant:
<voice 00493_00057464><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>真是不好意思……
鎮長您痛失了愛女，
一定也很傷心吧……<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57465.en:
<voice 00584_00057465><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...So long as everyone in town is doing well, I shall be
fine.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57465.ja:
<voice 00584_00057465><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……私は　町の皆さんが
　元気でいてくだされば　大丈夫ですから。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57465.ko:
<voice 00584_00057465><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……저는 마을분들이
　잘 지내 주시면 그걸로 충분합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57465.zh-Hans:
<voice 00584_00057465><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……只要镇子上的人
都能健康快乐，我就没事。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57465.zh-Hant:
<voice 00584_00057465><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……只要鎮上的居民們都安好，
我就沒事。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57466.en:
<voice 00634_00057466><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>Come now, your husband may be worried. It's about
time that you should return home.<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57466.ja:
<voice 00634_00057466><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>「さあ　ご主人が心配されますよ。
　そろそろ　戻りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57466.ko:
<voice 00634_00057466><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>: 자, 남편분이 걱정하시겠습니다.
　어서 돌아가세요.<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57466.zh-Hans:
<voice 00634_00057466><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>你丈夫会担心你的，
快回去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57466.zh-Hant:
<voice 00634_00057466><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>好了，妳丈夫會擔心的。
差不多該回去了。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57467.en:
<voice 00844_00057467><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Oh yeah, <pc>. Is that package possibly the item
that I requested. So then, may I have it.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57467.ja:
<voice 00844_00057467><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「おや　<pc>さん。
　その包みは　もしかして　私が頼んだ物ですか。
　それでは　引き取りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57467.ko:
<voice 00844_00057467><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc> 씨.
　그 꾸러미는 혹시 제가 부탁한 물건입니까?
　그럼 제가 받겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57467.zh-Hans:
<voice 00844_00057467><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>啊呀，<pc>，你手里的那个包裹，
难道是我订做的那个吗？
那我就收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57467.zh-Hant:
<voice 00844_00057467><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>喔？<pc>。
那個包裹裡難道裝著我委託你的東西嗎？
那你趕快交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87401.en: <pc> gave Mayor Burat the Pretty Parcel!
87401.ja:
<pc>は　きれいな包みを
ブラト町長に　渡した！
87401.zh-Hans:
<pc>把漂亮的包裹
交给了布莱特镇长！
87401.zh-Hant:
<pc>把漂亮的包裹
交給了布萊特鎮長！

57468.en: <voice 01124_00057468><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>Wh...What, is it an earthquake!?<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57468.ja: <voice 01124_00057468><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>「な……なんだ　地震かい！？<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57468.ko: <voice 01124_00057468><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>: 뭐…… 뭐지? 지진인가!?<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57468.zh-Hans: <voice 01124_00057468><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>怎……怎么了？地震吗？<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57468.zh-Hant: <voice 01124_00057468><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>怎、怎麼了？是地震嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57469.ja: <voice 01174_00057469><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>「きょ……教会が！！<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57469.ko: <voice 01174_00057469><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>: 교…… 교회가!!<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57471.ja: <voice 01474_00057471><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「あの声は……！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57471.ko: <voice 01474_00057471><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 저 목소리는……!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57471.zh-Hans: <voice 01474_00057471><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>那个声音！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57471.zh-Hant: <voice 01474_00057471><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>那聲音是……！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57472.en:
<voice 01544_00057472><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>Ju-just now, whose voice was that!? I can't handle this
anymore...!<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57472.ja:
<voice 01544_00057472><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>「い……今の声は　なんだい！？
　もう　こんなのイヤだよぉ……！<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57472.ko:
<voice 01544_00057472><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>: 바…… 방금 그 목소리는 뭐지!?
　난 정말 못 견디겠어……!<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57472.zh-Hans:
<voice 01544_00057472><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>刚……刚才那是什么声音？
我不想再遇上这种事了！<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57472.zh-Hant:
<voice 01544_00057472><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>剛、剛才的聲音是！？
我不想再遇到這種事了……！<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57473.en:
<voice 01584_00057473><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>I knew it, the ghost rumors are true! The dead children
resent us and are trying to drag us down with them...!<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57473.ja:
<voice 01584_00057473><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　幽霊のウワサは　本当なんだ！
　死んだ子供たちは　あたしらを恨んでて
　道連れにしようとしているんだ……！<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57473.ko:
<voice 01584_00057473><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>: 역시 유령 소문은 사실이었던 거야!
　죽은 아이들이 우리를 원망해서
　저승길 동무로 삼으려는 거라고……!<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57473.zh-Hans:
<voice 01584_00057473><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>那个幽灵的传闻果然是真的！
死去的孩子们对我们怀恨在心，
想把我们也带去那个世界……<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57473.zh-Hant:
<voice 01584_00057473><start_lip_sync n02171 _normal m00001>幽靈的傳聞果然是真的！
死去的孩子們因為憎恨我們，
就想把我們一起拉下去……！<stop_lip_animation n02171 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57474.ja: <voice 01629_00057474><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「フォルナさんっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57474.ko: <voice 01629_00057474><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 포르나 씨!!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57475.en:
<voice 02027_00057475><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>The church... And the color of the sky... What in the
world is happening...<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57475.ja:
<voice 02027_00057475><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>「教会が……　空の色も……。
　何が　どうなっているのですか……。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57475.ko:
<voice 02027_00057475><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>: 교회가…… 하늘의 색도…….
　뭐가 어떻게 된 건가요…….<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57475.zh-Hans:
<voice 02027_00057475><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>教会……天空的颜色也……
这到底是怎么了……<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57475.zh-Hant:
<voice 02027_00057475><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>教會和天空的顏色都……
這到底是怎麼回事……<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57476.en:
<voice 02197_00057476><start_lip_sync n02173 _normal m00001>Ahh? Why's everybody just standing there staring into
space?<stop_lip_animation n02173 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57476.ja:
<voice 02197_00057476><start_lip_sync n02173 _normal m00001>「あら？　皆さん。
　こんな所で　ボーッとして　どうしたんです？<stop_lip_animation n02173 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57476.ko:
<voice 02197_00057476><start_lip_sync n02173 _normal m00001>: 어머? 여러분.
　이런 곳에서 다들 멍하니 뭘 하고 계세요?<stop_lip_animation n02173 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57476.zh-Hans:
<voice 02197_00057476><start_lip_sync n02173 _normal m00001>哎呀？大家为什么都
站在这里发呆啊？<stop_lip_animation n02173 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57476.zh-Hant:
<voice 02197_00057476><start_lip_sync n02173 _normal m00001>咦？各位！
怎麼都站在這裡發呆？<stop_lip_animation n02173 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57477.en:
<voice 02267_00057477><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>...I-it's nothing. Carefully now, let's go inside the
church.<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57477.ja:
<voice 02267_00057477><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>「……い　いえ　なんでもありません。
　さあ　気をつけて　教会の中に入りましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57477.ko:
<voice 02267_00057477><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>: ……아, 아뇨. 아무것도 아닙니다.
　자, 조심해서 교회로 들어가시죠.<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57477.zh-Hans:
<voice 02267_00057477><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>……没、没事。什么事都没有。
来吧，小心脚步，进教会吧。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57477.zh-Hant:
<voice 02267_00057477><start_lip_sync n02170 _normal m00001>……沒、沒有，沒什麼。
來吧，小心腳步，進去教會吧。<stop_lip_animation n02170 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57478.en:
<voice 02442_00057478><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>That laughter just now was Liselotte's... Are you doing
this because of me...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57478.ja:
<voice 02442_00057478><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「今の笑い声は　リゼロッタの……。
　お前は　この私を……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57478.ko:
<voice 02442_00057478><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 방금 그 웃음소리는 리제롯타의…….
　넌 이런 나를…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57478.zh-Hans:
<voice 02442_00057478><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>刚才的笑声是丽泽萝妲的……
你想把我……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57478.zh-Hant:
<voice 02442_00057478><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>剛才的笑聲是莉賽蘿塔的……
妳想把我……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87402.en:
<voice 02562_00087402><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Ah, Aah... Right, <pc>. Allow me to thank you
for earlier, I apologize for the trouble, but please come
to my home.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87402.ja:
<voice 02562_00087402><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「あ　あぁ……そうでした　<pc>さん。 
　先ほどのお礼を　差し上げますので
　お手数ですが　私の家まで　おこしください。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87402.ko:
<voice 02562_00087402><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 아, 아아…… 네, <pc> 씨.
　부탁을 들어 주신 데 답례를 하고 싶으니
　번거로우시겠지만 저희 집으로 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87402.zh-Hans:
<voice 02562_00087402><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>啊、啊啊……对了，<pc>。
我要将之前的谢礼交给你，
所以还请麻烦你到我家来一趟吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87402.zh-Hant:
<voice 02562_00087402><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>啊、啊啊……對了，<pc>， 
我要將之前的謝禮交給你，
所以麻煩請你來我家一趟吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000066.en:
<voice 02443_29000066><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Mr. Mayor, your daughter... No, not one of the town's
children bear a grudge against you all.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000066.ja:
<voice 02443_29000066><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「町長さん。あなたの娘さんは
　……いえ　町の子供の　誰ひとりとして
　あなた達を　恨んではいません。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000066.ko:
<voice 02443_29000066><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 촌장님, 촌장님의 딸은
　……아니, 마을 아이들은 그 누구도
　여러분을 원망하지 않아요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000066.zh-Hans:
<voice 02443_29000066><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>镇长，你的女儿
……应该说，镇上没有一个孩子
对你们怀着怨恨。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000066.zh-Hant:
<voice 02443_29000066><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>鎮長，你的女兒
……應該說，鎮上沒有一個孩子
對你們懷著怨恨。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000068.en: <voice 02445_29000068><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That much is certain.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000068.ja: <voice 02445_29000068><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それだけは　確かです。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000068.ko: <voice 02445_29000068><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그것만은 분명해요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000068.zh-Hans: <voice 02445_29000068><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>唯有这点千真万确。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000068.zh-Hant: <voice 02445_29000068><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>唯有這點千真萬確。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87489.ja: <voice 00090_00087489><start_lip_sync n02055 _normal m00001>「……おい……。待…てよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02055 CLOSE_MOUTH>
